description:
When setting the admin password on an instance you may occasionally see this error in log files if the instance is not running:

'Instance is not running'

We should indicate that it was trying to set the admin password when this happens.
title: clarify error messages that occur when setting admin passwords

comments.content:
When setting the admin password on an instance you may occasionally see this error in log files if the instance is not running:

'Instance is not running'

We should indicate that it was trying to set the admin password when this happens.

commit 811a6f3f44acca3da53207a77f2e0ba6a6d59f16
Author: Dan Prince <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jan 18 22:18:55 2012 -0500

    Clarify error messages for admin passwords.
    
    Logs the instance uuid and a more clear error message when errors
    occur while setting admin passwords. Fixes LP bug #918502.
    
    Change-Id: I7d698ee87ac147cb5137cb77d0c0297a47507798
